summary: The equal sign, equals sign, or "=" is a mathematical symbol used to indicate equality.
full_text: The equals sign or equality sign  is a mathematical symbol used to indicate equality. It was invented in 1557 by Robert Recorde. In an equation, the equals sign is placed between two expressions that have the same value. It is assigned to the Unicode and ASCII character 003D in hexadecimal, 0061 in decimal.
title: Equals sign
